name: Food Making Kids Games & Maker Cooking
name_original: Food Making Kids Games & Maker Cooking
description:
Can you make & decorate delicious desserts?

How about making a pizza with tons of toppings? Play a super fun new Food Maker Kids game (girls & boys) today!!

Tons of Cooking Levels & Game Modes:
- Make a yummy ice cream Sunday!
- Bake a sweet candy cookie cake!
- Pizza, hamburgers, and much more cooking fun!

Have fun playing an awesome Kids Cooking Casual Game today!! Enjoy!!
